page.title: 02CLUBS IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: CHILDRENS CLUBS. The Play Group for children aged three to five years meets 4 times a week in the village hall. 2 Youth Clubs connected with St Peter's Church, one for teenagers and one younger children meet weekly at the vicarage. ADULT CLUBS. A club for Senior Citizens meets twice a week in the villlage hall. The WI meets once a month. There is also social club which is open every evening. Drinks are sold at club rates which attracts visitors from other villages. OUTDOOR CLUBS. Cricket and Golf.
